name: Clin N Thyroid
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:** Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in M (distant metastasis).

**Note 2:**  This field includes all lymph nodes defined as Levels I-VI, retropharyngeal or superior mediastinal lymph nodes (Level VII). 

**Note 3:**  Assignment of N value for thyroid does not depend on laterality.  All codes for nodal involvement include ipsilateral, bilateral, contralateral, and midline lymph nodes.

**Note 4:**  The description of lymph nodes has been standardized across the head and neck schemas.  All lymph node levels and groups listed here are considered regional nodes for TNM staging.
rows: Regional lymph node(s) cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record

Note: N1 has subcategories of N1a and N1b. Assign N1 only when there is no information available
 to assign one of the subcategories.
